moduleMetadataJson.name: VMware vCenter Server vmdir Authentication Bypass
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module bypasses LDAP authentication in VMware vCenter Server's
          vmdir service to add an arbitrary administrator user. Version 6.7
          prior to the 6.7U3f update is vulnerable.
author: JJ Lehmann
Ofri Ziv
wvu <wvu@metasploit.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'

options.name: BASE_DN
options.description: LDAP base DN if you already have it

options.name: USERNAME
options.description: Username of admin user to add

options.name: PASSWORD
options.description: Password of admin user to add
